aspect: 1. Patrick Kluivert coached Curacao in the 2018 World Cup qualifiers.
2. Curacao advanced to the second qualifying round by drawing 2-2 in a second-leg match against Montserrat and winning 4-3 on aggregate.
3. Kluivert led Curacao to victory in the first-round encounter, and they will face Cuba in the next round.
4. Kluivert, who is of Curacao descent, was a World Cup participant and former assistant coach for the Netherlands.
